mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_alam_base.select */ SELECT alam_no /* alam_no 알림_번호 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ts_alam_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND alam_no = #{alamNo} /* alam_no 알림_번호 numeric */
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_alam_base.update */ UPDATE ts_alam_base
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND alam_no = #{alamNo} /* alam_no 알림_번호 numeric */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_alam_base.merge */ INSERT INTO ts_alam_base ( alam_no /* alam_no 알림_번호 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{alamNo} /* alam_no 알림_번호 numeric */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) ON CONFLICT CONSTRAINT ts_alam_base_pkey DO UPDATE SET
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_alam_base.delete */ DELETE FROM ts_alam_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND alam_no = #{alamNo} /* alam_no 알림_번호 numeric */
